ComicInfo.Title: Batqueen and Guido, the Clone Wonder; Gender Bender; If I Were A Superhero(ine); A Speedy Return; Babequest; Superfreak; The Rubber Lovers; Anchor's Away!; Major Power and Spunky; Iron Woman: Adventures in Employment; Men in Tights; Wild Night: The Pretty Poor Excuse for an Origin Story of Immola
ComicInfo.Summary:
A lab accident causes a biotechnologist to develop the ability to turn straight people gay.
Iron Woman gets a real job.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 19:53:02. [Issue ID 167735]
